mapper.select: SELECT oi.item_id AS itemId, oi.item_name AS itemName, oi.item_img AS itemImg, oi.item_spec_id AS itemSpecId, oi.item_spec_name AS itemSpecName, oi.buy_counts AS buyCounts, oi.price AS price FROM order_items oi LEFT JOIN orders od ON od.id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
